messages.subject: hello and thanks
messages.msgSnippet: hello again. i was on this list for a very short time just a year or two ago. Then with the help of my friends-LOL- decided that there was absolutley no way
messages.messageBody:
hello again. i was on this list for a very short time just a year or two ago. Then with the "help" of my friends-LOL- decided that there was absolutley no way unschooling would work for us. This time I decided that it will and with my hubby's blessing we are commited to a year of trial. For the sake of family we are saying that we will reevaluate at the end of 2008. BUT since I evaluate my life at the end of every year it was an easy statement to make.
I have been lurking here for a week or so and the posts in answer to Karen's questions have really been a blessing to me. She has asked questions that i was afraid to articulate in my own mind!

I am looking forward to chatting with you all and gleaning from you. Any words of wisdom on adapting to this lifestyle are appreciated and welcomed.
My children still at home are ranging from fifteen down to almost three. (our younger seven)

Julie in MN



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
